import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Signin.css' import Navbar from '../Navbar/Navbar.js' import * as firebase from 'firebase' export default class Account extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { loading: true, modif: false } //this.display = this.display.bind(this) } componentDidMount() { var user = firebase.auth().currentUser; if (user) { this.setState({ user }) } else { alert("User not signed in !!!") } const ref = firebase.database().ref('/users/' + user.uid); ref.on('value', (snap) => { let account = snap.val() //alert(account.email, account.RPPS, account.region) this.setState({ account, loading: false }) }) } update(name, value, e) { e.preventDefault(); firebase.database().ref('users/' + this.state.user.uid).update( { [name]: [value] }) } handleChange(event){ this.setState({[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } handleSubmit(){ } modif(e){ e.preventDefault(); this.setState({modif:true}) } render() { const { account, loading, modif } = this.state; if (loading) return

Updating ...

else if (!modif) return (

Mon compte





Email: {account.email} Nom: {account.name} RPPS: {account.RPPS} Date de naissance: {account.bdate} Rue: {account.rue} Specialité: {account.specialite} Téléphone: {account.tel} Région: {account.region} Ville: {account.ville} Statut: {account.statut}


); return (

Mission {this.state.nomission}

); } }
